title: (x) Angela Dobrick Gestaltung monospaced sans - Simple {Arne Sänger}
content:
I'm pretty sure I've seen this one before, but can't place it at the moment. The example was found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824203614/http:/www.angela-dobrick.de/). Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824203614im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid_4351.jpg)
author: Chris Keegan
